title: Riot plz.How could you do dis
body:
I havent left a game for a while, yet for some odd reason, when i leave for 4 mins, and rejoin the game, i get 8 games of low priority queue for 20 mins. Isnt that strange? I myself barely ever leave games, and if i do, i almost always rejoin. 
Riot. Please. 8 games of 20 mins priority. Get it right or dont put it in at all. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Have you left games in the past?

Also, eight games? That shouldn't be possible.
